name: Captive Fury
Lore: 'Chewie''s life debt to Han forced him to act, retaliating unexpectedly against his captors.',
Text: 'USED: Cancel Force drain bonus from IT-O this turn.LOST: During your battle phase, any of your escorted captives at same site may initiate and participate in one battle (they may not use weapons or devices and you may not voluntarily forfeit or relocate them).',
